Job Summary: Join our dynamic Digital & Technology Solutions (DTS) Planning & Intake team as a Co-op Student, contributing to the budgeting and planning of Hydro One's IT investments and personnel. As a vital member of the team, you will gain experience in resource and asset planning, process management, and communication within a fast-paced IT environment. Job Responsibilities: • Assist in preparing the annual budget and multi-year business plan for the IT department through the gathering of project and staffing forecasts. • • • • • Collaborate with IT project managers to gather inputs for planning and ensure accuracy. Prioritize investments using agreed upon criteria. Maintain list of lower priority initiatives and reprioritize as appropriate. Maintain up-to-date investment planning records in the corporation-wide planning tool, Copperleaf AIP. Analyze variances between plans, forecasts and actuals, and prepare summary reports for management. Update and maintain rolling budgeting, forecasting, redirection and plan records for an up-to-date view of the multi-year investment plan. • • • Perform data validation and reconciliation between different sources of planning and resource data. Assist in preparing dashboards and presentations for budget reviews and planning meetings. Help identify areas for improvement to processes, modeling, reporting (e.g. Power BI dashboards) to enhance overall team efficiency and effectiveness.
